Package ddg.ui.view.dialog

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackpackTrade
    This class provides an interface to allow user to check a character's attributes, worn equipments and the backpack.
    CharacterEditor
    This class provides an interface to edit a character
    CharacterSelection
    This class provides the interface to choose an existing character.
    DDGaming
    This is a dialog style gaming UI
    GameInitDialog
    A dialog to choose Character and Campaign
    ItemSelection
    This class provides the interface to allow the user choose an item for the character
    PopUpForCreateNewMap
    dialog for asking map's size when user create a new map
    PopUpForFighter
    for popUp a Dialog supporting user chose character
    PopUpForItem
